block.p: Denise Jodi Albert, a daughter of Benita Oberlander of Northport, N.Y., and Marv Albert of Manhattan, was married last evening to Jordan Adam Fisch, a son of Dr. Deborah Diamond Fisch of Mount Arlington, N.J., and Jeffrey Fisch of Madison, N.J. Cantor Jacob Yaron officiated at the New York Botanical Garden.

Ms. Albert, 26, is keeping her name. She is a segment producer in Manhattan for ''Inside Edition,'' a syndicated tabloid television show. She graduated from Boston University. Her mother and stepfather, Gary Oberlander, are partners in Oberlander & Oberlander, a law firm in Mineola, N.Y. The bride's father is the host of ''SportsDesk'' a nightly news show on the Madison Square Garden Network, and is a basketball announcer for the NBC, TNT and TBS television networks. Mr. Albert is remarried to Heather Faulkiner.

Denise Jodi Albert, a daughter of Benita Oberlander of Northport, N.Y., and Marv Albert of Manhattan, was married last evening to Jordan Adam Fisch, a son of Dr. Deborah Diamond Fisch of Mount Arlington, N.J., and Jeffrey Fisch of Madison, N.J. Cantor Jacob Yaron officiated at the New York Botanical Garden.

Ms. Albert, 26, is keeping her name. She is a segment producer in Manhattan for ''Inside Edition,'' a syndicated tabloid television show. She graduated from Boston University. Her mother and stepfather, Gary Oberlander, are partners in Oberlander & Oberlander, a law firm in Mineola, N.Y. The bride's father is the host of ''SportsDesk'' a nightly news show on the Madison Square Garden Network, and is a basketball announcer for the NBC, TNT and TBS television networks. Mr. Albert is remarried to Heather Faulkiner.

Mr. Fisch, 29, is an associate at Cole, Schotz, Meisel, Forman & Leonard, a law firm in Hackensack, N.J. He graduated cum laude from the University of Massachusetts at Amherst and received a law degree from the University of Miami. His mother, a psychologist, practices in Morristown, N.J. His father is a lawyer practicing in Roseland, N.J.
